sys_template.name: Branch - Session Crash in SOE
sys_template.short_description: Crashed session has caused an incorrect allocation of stock
sys_template.template: short_description=Crashed session has caused an incorrect allocation of stock^instructions=The user's screen will have crashed out of a sales order and the stock on this ticket will be showing as allocated. The user will be unable to locate the ticket doing a sales order enquiry on the product number and if they run the Reallocate Stock by Product routine they will get a message saying "Product is in use in a sales order. Cannot Continue". Use the Stock Fix (SF) routine^affected_system=Branch Systems (RPN)^cmdb_ci=SFT-STKMGMT-RPN^close_notes=Corrected using the Stock Fix (SF) Routine^contact_type=phone^impact=3^category=^subcategory=^close_code=Solved (permanently)
